links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (26,-215,550).
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[1 / ((1 - 5 x) (1 - 10 x) (1 - 11 x)), {x, 0, 20}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 04 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) m:=20; R<x>:=PowerSeriesRing(Integers(), m); Coefficients(R!(1/((1-5*x)*(1-10*x)*(1-11*x)))); /* or */ I:=[1, 26, 461]; [n le 3 select I[n] else 26*Self(n-1)-215*Self(n-2)+550*Self(n-3): n in [1..20]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 04 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
